name: LIFELIFTRADIO
0:
”Alexa, open life lift radio”
”Alexa, start life lift radio”
”Alexa, ask life lift radio what's playing”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: life lift radio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
At Life Lift Radio, we believe in the power of music to inspire, transform, and elevate lives. More than just a radio station, we are a community-driven by faith, positivity, and a shared mission to spread hope. We provide an alternative to negative messages through a diverse range of music genres—from classic rock to hip-hop, pop, and more—ensuring that every lyric and rhythm encourages growth, joy, and personal upliftment.

With our slogan, "Lift Your Life," we aim to be the beacon that guides you through life’s ups and downs, giving you the strength to rise above challenges with the support of positive messages and good vibes. Whether you’re tuning in on your morning commute, while working, or to wind down at night, Life Lift Radio is always here to lift your soul with music that moves you.

Streaming across all platforms—Apple, Android, web, and more—we are easily accessible, so you can stay connected wherever you are. Whether you’re a long-time listener or discovering us for the first time, Life Lift Radio welcomes you with open arms and hearts.

Join us, and let’s make every moment a chance to lift our lives together.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
